pullRequest.title: Add recipes to crush compressed carbon into carbon and carbon into coal
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Added recipes (crush compressed carbon into carbon and carbon into coal) to the ore crusher as requested by approved suggestion #234.
Changes

Added the two recipes specified into the ore crusher.
Related Issues


N/A
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Added recipes to crush compressed carbon into carbon and carbon into coal

nodes.bodyText: This can just be an ItemStack
